title: Group Queue for Season 6 (Experienced Players) BRONZE AND SILVER
body:
Last season i finished in Bronze II looking to climb to Silver or Gold this season.We are looking for players who want to play their 10 placement games in a veteran team that choose to play as a team instead of Solo Q , which will increase the chances of us winning but only if the team is calm and collective. NO Ragers, Toxicity , AFKs/DIsconnected Players.

Add my account Judge Dredd
We  will have some Normal games just to train and form a strong team comp/gameplan

I main Mid lane but can play other roles decent.But have practiced mid this preseason.


Roles:
Champion Pool:
Hours:
Skype if possible:

replies.body:
roles: mid and support (jungle)
Champion pool: easier if you add me 
Hours: Free all weekend and most weekday nights
Skype: add me on league first

Roles: Adc Top Jg
Champion Pool: Adc - Vayne jinx Tristana Twitch Draven Ashe Top - Nasus Darius Shen Shyvana Jg - Shyvana Xin Jax Amumu Evelynn
Hours: any hours of the day
Skype if possible: yes i have skype

Can do any lane well
